meanings.sent1: Grandma received an annate from her family every Christmas.
meanings.sent2: The company gives its employees an annate as a bonus at the end of each year.
meanings.sent3: The surprise annate made everyone at the party smile.
meanings.sent4: The annate of kindness spread warmth and joy throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The annual annate was eagerly anticipated by all the children.

meanings.sent1: He decided to annate his savings to ensure a stable income for retirement.
meanings.sent2: The generous donor chose to annate a portion of their wealth to charity.
meanings.sent3: She playfully threatened to annate her brother's allowance if he didn't share his candy.
meanings.sent4: The investment annated a sense of security for the future.
meanings.sent5: The decision to annate the scholarship fund was met with gratitude and appreciation.

meanings.sent1: In his will, he annated a monthly stipend to his loyal assistant.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy philanthropist annated a significant sum to support education in underprivileged communities.
meanings.sent3: The eccentric uncle decided to annate his vintage car collection to his niece.
meanings.sent4: She chose to annate her valuable jewelry to her favorite charity.
meanings.sent5: The artist annated her masterpiece to a museum for future generations to enjoy.
